Type.Name: PopulatePopupHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PopulatePopupHandler(object o, PopulatePopupArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: The following events utilize this delegate:
Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the PopulatePopupHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the PopulatePopupHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the PopulatePopupHandler is removed from the event.
